Articles.Content: For me they fail on 19 m/s I guess i have to put on some control surfaces
or so many cannon's that you cant get up to 19 m/s
And the cannons are also destroying my own ships When i fire 3rd Newton's law keeps turning my ship around :C

And the cannons are also destroying my own ships When i fire 3rd Newton's law keeps turning my ship around :C

use cannon for thrust and steering
Well, thrust maybe but steering... noooooooo. My ship goes wild and something like "do a barrell roll" 600x speed

Well, thrust maybe but steering... noooooooo. My ship goes wild and something like "do a barrell roll" 600x speed

I have to admit that I fire both broadsides at once...

well i just saw this.....

thankyou to youtube user KottabosGames for taking the time to post this

Edited April 28, 2014 by Kerb-fu

Ok, I now have some days off, I hope I can do something constructive with them...

I am doing some retexturing and emmisive textures, but does anyone have an sugestions or problems they need fixed while i am back in the saddle

I cant believe i looked at this thread a few day's ago and didnt noticed it was released and not just a proof on concept. WORST time for my isp to shut down my net for a few day's.

Great work on the textures.

I dont know if its me (due to my dodgy connection) but when i did try to grab this off spaceport, it did come up with a invalid zipfile. I tried it twice with same results. I had to goto your drop box link, save it to mine, then d/l and it worked fine that way.

That is with version 16a

Invalid zipfiles are caused by interrupted connections. It might be that the file is too big, if you want to download a file whole from spaceport, you would need to get a download manager to avoid interruptions.

He hath returned!

It would be really cool if could make the balloon steering wheel act like a command seat

He hath returned!

It would be really cool if could make the balloon steering wheel act like a command seat

Yes that would be really cool
So how you doing?

can you change the landing legs so instead of using the landing leg module they use a model animate module? like with modded cargo bays? i think because your landing legs dont have suspension but the landing leg module requires suspension transform, so it makes null references to the log.if you use the model animate thing , it should work better.

So how you doing?

I am chipping away slowly... developing some larger parts for more power and stations etc

can you change the landing legs so instead of using the landing leg module they use a model animate module? like with modded cargo bays? i think because your landing legs dont have suspension but the landing leg module requires suspension transform, so it makes null references to the log.if you use the model animate thing , it should work better.

As soon as i can figure out the suspension heirarchy the legs will get upgraded

As soon as i can figure out the suspension heirarchy the legs will get upgraded

well thats nice, but maybe just for now as a sort of quick fix, change the module that animates it for now and then add the suspension stuff and the landing leg module back in a later update?
is this dead?

I've only just spotted this thread - may I say 'jolly well done!'. I was thinking of looking into how one might retexture stock parts to get a somewhat Steampunkesque look to things, but this mod far exceeds anything I could manage. I shall instruct the head buyer at the Bannister & Moore Engineering Works to sort out a contract for supply of parts from your good selves forthwith.

Yours,

Miss Esme Moore
dont die on me. we need your awesome steampunkness!!

is this dead?

not dead... just hibernating!
